sentences.sContent: Yes this is the…is the prime meridian if you like.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yes this is the…is the prime meridian if you like.
sentences.sCn: 是的，这就是本初子午线，它把地球分为东半球和西半球。

sentences.sContent: The prime meridian of longitude is in greenwich south london.
sentences.sContent_eng: The prime meridian of longitude is in greenwich south london.
sentences.sCn: 经度的本初子午线在伦敦南部的格林威治。

phrases.pCn: 本初子午线；本初子午圈

remMethod.val: meridi(南、 北) + an → 连接南北极之间的线 → 经线

words.tran: 南欧的；子午线的；南部的

trans.tranOther: one of the imaginary lines from the North Pole to the South Pole, drawn on a map of the Earth
